DOC.brief_title: The Effect Voltaren-ophtha 0.1 % Eye Drops INR Levels ( International Normalized Ratio ) Patients Taking Warfarin
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To examine effect topical Voltaren-Ophtha 0.1 % eye drop cataract surgery INR level ( international normalize ratio ) patient take warfarin . Methods : A prospective study . The study population include approximately 100 patient , take warfarin candidate cataract surgery . These patient continue warfarin therapy usual dose , operation . INR level ( international normalize ratio ) check week take Voltaren eye drop customary cataract surgery .
